resources.string: Calyx VPN is an easy, fast and secure VPN service from The Calyx Institute. You can read more, and donate at https://calyxinstitute.org.

By using this application you agree to the Terms of Service available at https://calyxinstitute.org/legal/terms-of-service. This service is provided as-is, without any warranty and is intended for people who work to make the world a better place.
